import { useState } from "react"; import "./RegisterBody.css"; const Register_Body = () => { const [classes_for_first_form, set_classes_for_first_form] = useState("single-form"); const [classes_for_sec_form, set_classes_for_sec_form] = useState("single-form"); const [classes_for_third_form, set_classes_for_third_form] = useState("single-form"); const [classes_for_forth_step, set_classes_for_forth_step] = useState("final-step"); const [first_step, set_first_step] = useState("active"); const [sec_step, set_sec_step] = useState(""); const [third_step, set_third_step] = useState(""); const [forth_step, set_forth_step] = useState(""); const FirstFormSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); set_classes_for_first_form("single-form hide_form"); set_classes_for_sec_form("single-form show_form"); set_first_step(""); set_sec_step("active"); }; const SecFormSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); set_classes_for_sec_form("single-form hide_form"); set_classes_for_third_form("single-form show_form"); set_sec_step(""); set_third_step("active"); }; const ThirdFormSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); set_classes_for_third_form("single-form hide_form"); set_classes_for_forth_step("final-step show_form"); set_third_step(""); set_forth_step("active"); }; return (
